name: Furniture_of_America_Hurshel_Grey_Faux_Leather_Reclining_Loveseat_with_Console
description: Embrace comfort and convenience with this delightfully inviting loveseat. Included with the piece is a handy center console between the two reclining parts of the loveseat, which offers a large compartment and two additional cup holders.Set includes: One (1) loveseat and one (1) center consoleMaterials: Metal, faux leather, foam, plasticFinish: GreyUpholstery material: Faux leatherUpholstery fill: FoamReclining function on both seats easily accessed with simple side latch pullsCenter console in loveseat provides one (1) covered storage and two (2) cup holdersPuffed faux leather upholstery creates a luxurious cradleBucket seat design adds a comforting effect to the entire pieceMatching recliner and sofa sold separatelyAll dimensions are approximateLoveseat dimensions: 39 inches high x 76 inches wide x 38 inches deepStyleContemporary, Modern, TransitionalMaterialFaux Leather, Foam, Metal, PlasticTypeLoveseatAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGreyFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesPower Recline
